item.title: FROST
item.description: Location: Zcon 3 FROST paper: https://eprint.iacr.org/2020/852.pdf Sydney Socratic on FROST: https://btctranscripts.com/sydney-bitcoin-meetup/2022-03-29-socratic-seminar/ Introduction Elizabeth Crites (EC): My name is Elizabeth Crites, I’m a postdoc at the University of Edinburgh. Chelsea Komlo (CK): I’m Chelsea Komlo, I’m at the University of Waterloo and I’m also a Principal Researcher at the Zcash Foundation. Today we will be giving you research updates on FROST. What is FROST? (Chelsea Komlo) You might not know what FROST is and that’s totally ok.
